input.prompt: Find information about the "claude doctor" command and what it does for troubleshooting Claude Code issues

cwd: /Users/sugioyuuichi/Documents/プログラミング/HTML・CSS・Javascript/VSCode/freeism-app

content.content: Based on the troubleshooting page, the `/doctor` command is a diagnostic tool for checking the health of your Claude Code installation. Specifically, the page mentions it in the "Getting more help" section, recommending users "Run `/doctor` to check the health of your Claude Code installation" if they are experiencing issues not covered in the troubleshooting guide.

toolUseResult.result: Based on the troubleshooting page, the `/doctor` command is a diagnostic tool for checking the health of your Claude Code installation. Specifically, the page mentions it in the "Getting more help" section, recommending users "Run `/doctor` to check the health of your Claude Code installation" if they are experiencing issues not covered in the troubleshooting guide.

cwd: /Users/sugioyuuichi/Documents/プログラミング/HTML・CSS・Javascript/VSCode/freeism-app

content.text:
Claude Codeの診断ツールです。`/doctor`コマンドは、Claude Codeのインストール状態の健全性をチェックします。

問題が発生している場合、このコマンドを実行すると、設定やインストールに関する潜在的な問題を特定できます。
